display_long_description:
**FREERUNNER CHAMPIONSHIPS IS AN EARLY PROTOTYPE.
PLAY, COMPETE, AND SHAPE THE FUTURE!**

Join the Discord - https://discord.gg/GGazPAMxGm

Freerunner Championships is an early access prototype, parkour-inspired racing game where strategy and precision collide! Navigate challenging urban landscapes, push your limits, and find the fastest route to victory. Every move counts—speed and accuracy will determine the ultimate champion!
 
[media]

Compete against players worldwide and climb the global leaderboard!
 Test new features, refine your skills, and help shape the game’s future!
 As a Maze Theory prototype, Freerunner Championships is in continuous development, and your feedback will help define what comes next.
Here’s what’s included:

[media]

Tutorial Hub – whether you're new to Freerunner or looking to hone your skills, the all-new tutorial is here for you.

In-Game Progression – start off as a Newbie and work your way up to King by earning CRED and leveling up your FAME.

Time Trials – compete against friends and rivals in fast-paced trials to secure top spot on the leaderboard.

Ribbon Recording – use ribbon recording to track your performance and see where you can save valuable time.

Graffiti Tagging – grab your spray cans from your sling bag and be the first to tag a wall, showcasing your designs to the world (currently using stencils)!

[media]
